channel.title: Can someone explain how random event maps are made?
channel.description:
For example, the sandwich lady event. If you get sandwich lady random event on RS and you look on your minimap there is no other buildings (no construction maps).
In a 562+ server if you teleport to coords of sandwich lady you will see the construction maps.
How would i make so that you don't see them? Im not talking about deleting the construction maps, i might need them later.

item.title: Can someone explain how random event maps are made?
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:2, topic:447606”]map editor, then just move your co-ords to diffrent locations…[/quote]Thats true, never thought of that thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone explain how random event maps are made?
